thread.title: Jordan Peele From ‘Key And Peele’ Did A Drunk Barack Obama Impression On ‘Late Night’
thread.title_full: Jordan Peele From ‘Key And Peele’ Did A Drunk Barack Obama Impression On ‘Late Night’

author: Cass Anderson
title: Jordan Peele From ‘Key And Peele’ Did A Drunk Barack Obama Impression On ‘Late Night’
text:
Jordan Peele’s impression of Barack Obama was PERFECT on Key & Peele . His impression was often rolled out in tandem with ‘Luther The Anger Translator’ played by Keegan-Michael Key, a character that was so good President Barack Obama even used it at the White House Correspondent’s Dinner.
Last night, Jordan Peele was a guest on Late Night with Seth Meyers and he not only revived his impression of Brack Obama but he busted out a rare ‘Drunk Obama’ impression. Imagining what life is like for Barry O. these days, Jordan Peele gave us a look through the lens of how Obama might be looking at America these days.
It’s been over a month since we last saw Jordan Peele’s impression of Barack, something he busted out on The Daily Show back in early January . I think we’d be foolish to assume this is the last time we get to see this spot-on impression of Barack because Jordan Peele’s not a fool, and he knows what the people want to see. Frankly, I wouldn’t be shocked if we see in on SNL in the very near future busting out this impression.
